TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將處理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試複製作業期間加入的資料物件的資料格式時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation. A事件處理常式方法通常用來篩選不想要或不必要的資料格式，無法套用至套用複製命令最佳化。A event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a .
